content:
Aronsohn/Mager family

1 Aron MAGER ARONSOHN                1769-71 - 1847 #300 (Jozef+Sara) {census family 182}
 + Basheba (Schewa)                  1774 - 1848 #301 (Lazar+Marya)
  2x Juda Aron MAGER ARONSOHN        1794-99
    + Chaja Sara KATZ                1787
          married Nov 25, 1819 #40
     3o Rywka MAGER                  1817 #26
     3x Lazar Joseph MAGER           1821 #26
       + Felicia GRUNFELD            1839 Jaslo
             married Jul 13, 1857 #231
        4o Ida ARONSOHN              1857 Krakow
        4o Arthur ARONSOHN           Oct 13, 1859 #2156
        4x Stanislaw ARONSOHN        1863 Krakow
             divorced 1863-80

             married Jul 25, 1878 #34

          + Natalia SPITZER          - 1926
                married Feb 15, 1884 Myslwice

          ?? * Jozef KORNGOLD        May 22, 1885 #326
          ??     FAMILY LISTING

             * Fedor GOLDSCHNEIDER   Antonienhutte
                   banns Prog.Syn 1914 #332
           5x Ludwik Jozef ARONSOHN  Apr 21, 1895 Podgorze
             + Regina POPPER (POPERLE)  May 18, 1896 #454
                   married Prog.Syn Sep 25, 1921 #595
        4x Moritz ARONSOHN           Jun 29, 1858 #1418 - after 1870
        4o Feigel (Franciszka) ARONSOHN  Mar 18, 1860 #2331
          * Emanuel BLOCH            Apr-May 1861 Nowy Targ
                married Aug 21, 1888 #100
        4x Jakob ARONSOHN            Dec 13, 1861 (1862 #278)
          + Rachel ASCHKENAZI        Jun 14, 1870 #78 Przemysl
                married 1894 #27 Przemysl

                married Aug 16, 1891 #106
              FAMILY LISTING

        4x Julian ARONSOHN           Oct 29, 1869 Krakow
